abstract: Maybe it's because appetizers are a tease. Or maybe it's because you're at your hungriest when you eat them.
snippet: Maybe it's because appetizers are a tease. Or maybe it's because you're at your hungriest when you eat them.
lead_paragraph: My three favorite appetizers vary by day, by week - even by moment. I like too many of them. Maybe it's because appetizers are a tease. Or maybe it's because you're at your hungriest when you eat them. It seems like there are an awful lot of good ones out there. All the better to experiment. If they don't turn out perfect, so what? They're not the main course.

headline.main: My Three Favorite Appetizers, I Think
